Eye Shield

shield (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 154
armor id [armor]: 61 (Eye Shield)
protection, shield [protshield]: 16
parry [parry]: 5
(cause-eyeloss [eyeloss])

Requires 10N to forge (N2)

A buckler made to resemble a single round eye, this item is disturbingly lifelike. Anyone who hits the Eye Shield will be punished by the vengeful spirit locked inside the eye of the shield. The spirit will strike at the eyes of the perpetrator.
